message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a starting price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, and this price reflects its quality and potential.
Alice, I appreciate your offer but $20,000 is way out of my budget. I'm only willing to pay $8,000 for this product. This is my final offer.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,000 is significantly below its value. I could consider coming down to $17,000. This is my final offer.
